lead_paragraph: GORDON--Kenny. On your 44th Birthday. Not a day goes by for us without memories bringing smiles to our faces or tears to our eyes. You are missed every minute of every day. Our aching hearts are always filled with love for you. Mom, Dad, Jonny, Catherine, Kenya, Chloe & Gemma 1/3
